comments:
Running the 20020215 build, I found the following walkbacks in my .log file.
I'm using the Hursley 1.3.0 JRE for both eclipse and the target VM.  It's 
possible that these walkbacks occurred when I was attached to a WSAD server 
started by another instance of Eclipse.  There were multiple instances of each 
walkback:

Sorry I can't give steps to repeat, but I thought that the walkbacks might 
still be interesting.

Closing. Although the walkbacks are interesting, we can't do much without a 
reproduceable test case.

Also, we no longer have a variables view that updates icons - the technology 
for showing changed variables now uses text coloring. So, the code where this 
walkback occurred no longer exists.
